title: 100% Organic Argan Oil for Skin & Hair - Pure Virgin Argan Oil is Cold Pressed for Highest Quality - Supports Hair Growth - One of the Best Natural Anti-Aging/Anti-Wrinkle Skin Care Products - Super Antioxidant Moisturizer with Vitamin E - Fast Absorbing and Non Greasy Beauty Treatment - Feel Confident with Our Satisfaction Guarantee!
description: Your search for the best Argan Oil is finally over. Dark glass bottle protects the oil. When you purchase from us today, here's some of the things you can look forward to.  Users of Argan Oil have reported that it gently moisturizes and hydrates their face, but does not clog pores. We think you'll agree, having amazing skin and hair can be as easy as applying a few drops to your skin and hair each day. You may be wondering, "why does Argan Oil by Bela Alma work so effectively, even when other products fail? Well, it's simple really. First, we use only the finest cold-pressed Argan Oil. We air freight our freshly processed oils in temperature control bottles directly from Morocco. Beware of cheap Argan Oil that may "technically" be organic but has been subjected to long periods of heat and storage while being shipped in large containers on cargo ships. Perhaps this attention to detail is what separates us from all the other competitors! It cost us more to produce, but that's OK - you are worth it! Bela Alma Argan Oil possesses a remarkable ability to nourish, moisturize and improve skin elasticity. The oil is high in omega-9 oleic acid and omega-6 linoleic acid. Argan oil can be effective in treating dry skin, eczema, psoriasis, acne and sunburned skin. It is a good choice for inclusion in formulations for mature skin. Its high polyphenol content makes it a strong anti-oxidant and adds to its stable shelf life. Argan oil possesses anti-inflammatory properties and is a highly beneficial addition to formulations intended to reduce swelling and ease muscular aches and pains. Bela Alma Argan Oil has no chemical treatments, no paraben, is vegan for cosmetic purposes. Our product is internationally certified as 100% pure and organic by the Eco-Cert ICO, and carries the approval of USA NOP ORGANIC USDA. Since we offer a 60 day risk free guarantee of happiness or your money back - just give it a chance to work for you.
